entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
